mapper.select: select id, product_name as productName, product_code as productCode, location_name as locationName, quanty, per_weight as perWeight from tb_warehouse_inventory where product_code = #{productCode};

mapper.insert: insert into tb_warehouse_inventory(product_name, product_code, location_name, quanty, per_weight) values ( #{productName}, #{productCode}, #{locationName}, #{quanty}, #{perWeight} )
